title: sem 3 😥😮
content: i just wanted to ask whether the future sems will be as hard as sem 3 , cuz personally , i felt sem 3 cse is kinda hard with just the humungous amount to study . does it get better or all downhill from here ?

comments.body:
It'll keep getting harder😉

You'll reach a point where you'll think
"Oh god, it can't get harder"


And then it does😏


*no pun intended
3rd and 4th sem are usually the most tough and most important regarding your placements.

3rd semester is probably the hardest semester out of the 6. Since you've just got to your department and suddenly have a sudden change of difficulty, you'll feel that way. Every sem after this is easier dw. It won't be easy, but it won't be nearly as hard as 3rd sem. If you can just get through third sem, you can easily manage every other semester dw

Wait what
Just study the slides and u should be able to get 8.5-9cgpa.
